General.Name: Sunyard System Engineering Co Ltd
General.Description: Sunyard Technology Co.,Ltd provides payment solutions worldwide. The company offers payment terminals and financial software products, including payment password system, same-city liquidation system, corporate e-bank system, risk alarm system, etc. Its products portfolio includes mobile terminals, mobiles, miniPOS, mPOS, PIN pads, and financial recognition screens; electronic cash registers, handheld 2D wired barcode scanners, handheld 2D wireless barcode scanners, and Android ECR; QR code readers; and hardware security modules. The company also offers terminal management systems, integrated acquiring systems, and omni-channel payment solutions. The company was formerly known as Sunyard System Engineering Co., Ltd. Sunyard Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
